stories.headline: A scramble to assess the dangers of President-elect Donald Trumpâ€™s global business empire

ownerships.owner: THC Jeddah Hotel Manager Member Corp.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of THC Jeddah Hotel Manager LLC. The company was reportedly dissolved Nov. 15, 2016. Trump's financial disclosure indicates it held no independent value or income, and existed to hold license deals that were prospective, inactive, or otherwise did not currently have valuable assets or create income. It was owned 99 percent by Donald Trump directly, and 1 percent by THC Jeddah Hotel Manager Member Corp., of which Donald Trump was the sole owner.
Former director/chairman/president of THC Jeddah Hotel Manager Member Corp. The company was reportedly dissolved on Nov. 15, 2016. It was owned solely by Donald Trump.
familyMemberEthics.business: THC Jeddah Hotel Manager Member Corp.
